Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<GameMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Model
public class Model
extends Observable<GameMessage>
This class is the model of the application

    Method used to change the Position of the current Constructor from his old one to the one that's passed as input.
    void performPush​(Position pos)
    This method performs the special movement of the God Minotaur: he can move his Constructor to the position of the enemy player one, but only if the enemy Constructor is in the same row/column that he is.
    void performSwap​(Position pos)
    This method performs the special movement of the God Apollo: he can swap his Constructor with one of the enemy player, but only if the enemy Constructor is 1 Tile away from him.

      private final GameState gameState

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model​(java.util.List<Player> playerList)

  • Method Details

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      Method used to change the current phase of the game. If there's no more phases for the current Player then the method change turn instead of the phase

    • forceNotify

      public void forceNotify​(GameMessage message)
      This method will be uused to notify a message
      Parameters:
      message - GameMessage we want to notify

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      This method lets the game begins

    • serverMove

      public void serverMove​(Constructor c, Position p, java.lang.String idPlayer)
      This method places a constructor on the board during the initialization of the board
      Parameters:
      c - the constructor we want to place
      p - the position we want to place the constructor in
      idPlayer - id of the current player

    • performChooseConstructor

      public void performChooseConstructor​(Position pos)
      It sets currentConstructor to the actual Constructor in the position passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      pos - The Position where there's the constructor the player wants to choose.

    • performMove

      public void performMove​(Position pos)
      Method used to change the Position of the current Constructor from his old one to the one that's passed as input. After moving the Constructor, the method create a new ConstructorMatrix and send (through a notify()) a new MoveMessage to every Observer
      Parameters:
      pos - Position where to move the currentConstructor

    • performSwap

      public void performSwap​(Position pos)
      This method performs the special movement of the God Apollo: he can swap his Constructor with one of the enemy player, but only if the enemy Constructor is 1 Tile away from him.
      Parameters:
      pos - the Position of the enemy Constructor

    • performPush

      public void performPush​(Position pos)
      This method performs the special movement of the God Minotaur: he can move his Constructor to the position of the enemy player one, but only if the enemy Constructor is in the same row/column that he is.
      Parameters:
      pos - the Position of the enemy Constructor

    • performBuild

      public void performBuild​(Position pos)
      Method used to build on the Tile in the Position that's passed as input. After raising the level of the building, the method create a new BuildingMatrix and send (through a notify()) a new BuildMessage to every Observer
      Parameters:
      pos - Position where to build

    • createPossibleConstructorPos

      public void createPossibleConstructorPos()
      This method is used to create an array of Position, which contains every Constructor of the current Player that can actually move. It notify observers by a TileToShowMessage.

    • createPossibleMovePos

      public void createPossibleMovePos​(java.util.List<Position> addList, java.util.List<Position> deleteList)
      This method creates an ArrayList which contains every possible move the Constructor can perform. It helps to control the special power of certain Gods
      Parameters:
      addList - list of Positions that has to be added to list
      deleteList - list of Positions that has to be removed from list

    • createPossibleBuildPos

      public void createPossibleBuildPos​(java.util.List<Position> addList, java.util.List<Position> deleteList)
      This method creates an ArrayList which contains every possible Position the Constructor can perform a build. It helps to control the special power of certain Gods
      Parameters:
      addList - list of Positions that has to be added to list
      deleteList - list of Positions that has to be removed from list

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied​(Position p)
      Method used to check if the Tile corresponding to the Position passed as input is already occupied by someone
      Parameters:
      p - Position where the Tile is located
      Returns:
      if the Tile is already occupied

    • changeActiveConstructors

      public void changeActiveConstructors()
      This method checks if every Constructor of the current Player can perform a move. If it can not, the Constructor is deactivated.

    • isLosing

      public boolean isLosing​(Player p)
      Method used to check if a Player is losing due to the inability to move any of his/hers Constructor
      Parameters:
      p - Player to check
      Returns:
      if the Player is losing

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin()
      Method used to check if the current Player won after performing any king of Move phase
      Returns:
      if the Player is now located on a level 3 construction and his position before was on a level 2 construction

    • isPlayerTurn

      public boolean isPlayerTurn​(java.lang.String p)
      The method is used to check if it's the turn of the given Player
      Parameters:
      p - Player to check
      Returns:
      if it's his/hers turn

    • isLastStanding

      public boolean isLastStanding()
      This method checks if the Player is the only one that can perform a move
      Returns:
      true if he is the only one that can perform a move, false if he is not.

    • isLosing

      public boolean isLosing()
      This method will be used in the application to check if the current player is losing
      Returns:
      a boolean which indicates if the player is losing the game (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

    • destroyRemainingPhases

      public void destroyRemainingPhases()
      It destroys every phase of the current player.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String playerId)
      This method removes a Player from the game
      Parameters:
      playerId - id of the Player we want to remove

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This method notify all players the game ended, showing the winner id on screen

    • setTileToShow

      public void setTileToShow​(java.util.List<Position> tileToShow)
      This method sets the attribute tileToShow of this class
      Parameters:
      tileToShow - is a List of positions

    • setCurrentConstructor

      public void setCurrentConstructor​(Constructor currentConstructor)
      This method set the current constructor with the one passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      currentConstructor - the constructor we want to become as current.

    • getTileToShow

      public java.util.List<Position> getTileToShow()
      This method returns the attribute tileToShow of this class
      Returns:
      a List of positions

    • getListPlayer

      public java.util.List<Player> getListPlayer()
      This method returns the List of players who are playing the game
      Returns:
      a List of Players

    • getCurrentPhase

      public PossiblePhases getCurrentPhase()
      This method returns the phase the game is at the moment
      Returns:
      a PossiblePhases

    • getCurrentPlayerController

      public GodController getCurrentPlayerController()
      This method return the GodController of the God the current Player has.
      Returns:
      The GodController of the current player's God

    • getCurrentGod

      public God getCurrentGod()
      Returns:
      the God of the current player

    • getCurrentPlayerId

      public java.lang.String getCurrentPlayerId()
      Returns:
      the id of the current player

    • getCanGoUp

      public boolean getCanGoUp()
      Returns:
      a boolean which indicates if the currentConstructor can go up

    • getBoard

      protected Board getBoard()

    • getGameState

      protected GameState getGameState()

    • getCurrentConstructor

      public Constructor getCurrentConstructor()

    • getDome

      public boolean getDome​(Position pos)

    • getOccupied

      public boolean getOccupied​(Position pos)

    • getConstructionLevel

      public int getConstructionLevel​(Position pos)

    • checkListsParameter

      private java.util.List<Position> checkListsParameter​(java.util.List<Position> list, java.util.List<Position> addList, java.util.List<Position> deleteList)
      Helper method, it checks every parameter that will be add in the tileToShowList;
      Parameters:
      list - list of Positions where the Player perform a move/build
      addList - other Positions where the Player can move/build
      deleteList - other Positions where the Player can't move
      Returns:
      final list of Positions where the Player can perform a move/build
